game_info.name: Binding of Isaac Clone
game_info.description: Top-down roguelike dungeon crawler with twin-stick shooter mechanics. Player controls a crying child navigating procedurally generated basement floors, shooting tears at enemies, collecting items that stack and synergize, and fighting bosses to descend deeper.

core_loop.description: Enter room -> Clear enemies (doors lock until cleared) -> Collect pickups -> Find treasure/shop/boss rooms -> Beat boss -> Descend to next floor -> Repeat until death or victory

primary_action.description: Fire tears in cardinal directions with arrow keys

secondary_actions.name: toggle_map
secondary_actions.description: Hold for full map, tap to cycle minimap

combat_profile.how_to_attack: Press arrow keys to fire tears in that direction while moving with WASD. Tears are projectiles that damage enemies on contact.

key_features.name: 13x7 Room Grid
key_features.test_method: Verify room dimensions and tile-aligned objects

key_features.name: Twin-Stick Shooting
key_features.test_method: WASD moves, Arrow keys fire tears

key_features.name: Health System (Hearts)
key_features.test_method: Take damage, verify heart loss and i-frames

key_features.name: Room Transitions
key_features.test_method: Clear room, doors open, walk through to next room

key_features.name: Enemy Spawn Animation
key_features.test_method: Enemies play spawn animation, cannot attack during spawn

key_features.name: Procedural Floor Generation
key_features.test_method: Verify breadth-first room expansion, special room placement

key_features.name: Destructible Objects
key_features.gdd_section: Feedback Requirements - Poops Must Be Destroyable
key_features.test_method: Shoot poop, verify damage states and destruction

key_features.name: Room Persistence
key_features.test_method: Leave room, return, verify killed enemies stay dead

known_issues_from_gdd: Player can get stuck in objects when entering rooms
Previous crashes when shooting/killing certain enemies
No damage numbers should appear (not Isaac style)
